info.title: Product
info.description:
Can be either tangible, such as physical goods such as
materials or articles, or intangible, such as services and
digital goods that are part of the business activity of a
company. It can be traded and it contributes directly or
indirectly to the value chain. It does not extend to
instance level, such as individual materials stocked as
physical inventory, meaning that individual objects and
serialized materials are not part of the product domain. It
also does not extend to subsets of a material, such as
batches.

x-sap-shortText:

instance level, such as individual materials stocked as
physical inventory, meaning that individual objects and
serialized materials are not part of the product domain. It
also does not extend to subsets of a material, such as
batches.

sap.graph.Product.title: Product

createdAt.description: Date and time the entity was created.

changedAt.description: Date and time the entity was changed last.

displayId.description: A unique identifier that represents a product.

name.description: The language dependent name of a product.

status.description:
Cross-Plant Product Status The cross-plant product status
restricts the usability of the product for all plants, that
is, it defines whether a warning or error message is
displayed if you include the product in a particular
function

baseUnit.description:
A code that represents the base unit of measure of the
product.

division.description:
A way of grouping materials, products, or services.
Divisions are used to determine the sales areas and the
business areas for a material, product, or service. A
product or service is always assigned to just one division.

_division.description:
A way of grouping materials, products, or services.
Divisions are used to determine the sales areas and the
business areas for a material, product, or service. A
product or service is always assigned to just one division.

quantityConversions.description:
A product has conversion factors between units of measure.
For example, a product is measured in gallons and liters.

quantityCharacteristics.description: A product can have multiple characteristics.

plants.description:
A product is planned, procured, and distributed by multiple
plants.

distributionChains.description:
Sales and delivery data for the product, specific for a
combination of sales organization and distribution channel.

salesStatus.description:
Cross-distribution-chain material status Indicates whether
the material may be used in individual functions in Sales
and Distribution for all distribution chains..

salesUnit.description: Unit of measure in which the material is sold.

minimumOrderQuantity.description:
Minimum order quantity in base unit of measure The minimum
quantity a customer may order.

pricingProduct.description:
Material master record that the system uses as a reference
for pricing purposes.

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_BatchRequests).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

multipart/mixed;boundary=request-separat.example:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET Bank HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

multipart/mixed.example:
--response-separator
Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--
